# WebServiceRequest.AcceptedStatusCodes property

Gets or sets the accepted status codes.

```csharp
public ReadOnlyCollection<HttpStatusCode> AcceptedStatusCodes { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

The accepted status codes; if null, all status codes are accepted.

## Remarks

The default value of this property contains HttpStatusCode.OK and HttpStatusCode.Created.
